Class Utils

java.lang.Object
com.ovoc01.app.core.tools.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
This class provides utility methods for the application.

      Returns the current value of the specified sequence.
      Parameters:
      sequence - the name of the sequence
      field - the primary key field of the table associated with the sequence
      c - the database connection
      Returns:
      the current value of the sequence
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the connection is null
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the query

      Returns a string with leading zeros to match the given length.
      Parameters:
      nbr - the number to pad with zeros
      pk - the prefix to add before the number
      nbrL - the total length of the resulting string
      Returns:
      the padded string

      public static String createSetter(String field)

      Returns:

    • getColumnName

      public static String getColumnName(Field field)
      Gets the column name for a field based on its associated Column annotation. If no custom name is specified, the field name is used.
      Parameters:
      field - The field for which to retrieve the column name.
      Returns:
      The column name.

    • columnToSelect

      public static String columnToSelect(Object object)
      Generates a comma-separated list of column names for a given object based on its fields that should be inserted into the database.
      Parameters:
      object - The database object for which to generate the column list.
      Returns:
      A string containing the comma-separated column names.

    • createObject

      public static Object createObject(ResultSet rSet, Object object) throws SQLException, NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException, IllegalAccessException, IllegalArgumentException, InvocationTargetException, InstantiationException
      Creates and populates an object based on the data from a ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      rSet - The ResultSet containing the data to populate the object.
      object - The object to be populated with data.
      Returns:
      An object populated with data from the ResultSet.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      NoSuchMethodException - If a requested method is not found.
      SecurityException - If a security violation occurs.
      IllegalAccessException - If access to a class is denied.
      IllegalArgumentException - If an illegal argument is passed.
      InvocationTargetException - If an invocation target exception occurs.
      InstantiationException - If an instantiation error occurs.

      Parameters:
      obj - The object to be converted to JSON.
      Returns:

      Retrieve an array of fields annotated with a 'View' annotation from the provided object.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      An array of fields annotated with 'View'.
